item.title: Dumped purple sacks of garden waste at the junction of Mounthurst Road and Bourne Vale, 15th June
item.description:
There are dumped purple sacks of garden waste at the junction of Mounthurst Road and Bourne Vale. These sacks need to be picked up and removed ASAP, otherwise more fly tipping will occur here.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mounthurst Road, Hayes, London

item.title: Electricity box in Chilham Way at junction with Farleigh Avenue, 15th June
item.description:
There is graffiti on the electricity box in Chilham Way at the junction with Farleigh Avenue. This graffiti needs to be removed ASAP, otherwise it will multiply.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chilham Way, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Regular dog fouling, 15th June
item.description:
One dog owner is bringing his dog to Embassy court Da144ew every day and leaving the dog poop on private property. Its either on pathway to our flats or front garden or infront of garage. Many kids live in embassy court and are accidentally stepping on it regularly. The dog owner is not ready to pick up the poop and lets dog poop in our complex. This is getting very unhygenic and dangerous for residents. Dog owner walks in the area in the evening around 7 pm or early morning around 5-6 am
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Embassy Court, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Norwood Road SE27 very south end from Robson Roa, 15th June
item.description:
Norwood Road SE27 very south end from Robson Road junction to very north end of Knights Hill to Bloom Grove junction north bound carriageway (opposite West Norwood Cemetery main entrance frontage) road markings need re-painting – currently ‘ghost’ markings. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/place/10+Park+Hall+Rd,+Norwood,+London+SE21+8DW/@51.4333431,-0.1037239,3a,64y,37.13h,74.71t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sB6SyWedDUziZEA4S7KNwCQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D15.28621876621618%26panoid%3DB6SyWedDUziZEA4S7KNwCQ%26yaw%3D37.132326969708345!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x48760400be7aca43:0x6e675e98886f1ec0!8m2!3d51.4350144!4d-0.0948247!16s%2Fg%2F11bw3gz4w3?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYxMS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 386, Norwood Road, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation overhanging pavement from street trees, 15th June
item.description:
Hawthorn Vegetation reducing the width of the pavement at the junction between Perry Street and Old Perry Street. Forcing pedestrians to walk close to the edge. Old Perry Street is very busy at this point with cars dropping pupils for Farringtons School.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Perry Street, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Norwood High Street SE27 between West Norwood Library and number 9 – just sout, 15th June
item.description:
Norwood High Street SE27 between West Norwood Library and number 9 – just south of West Norwood Library red cloths recycling bin – red painted metal which graffiti tagged multi sides. item.title: Norwood High Street SE27 between West Norwood, 15th June
item.description:
Norwood High Street SE27 between West Norwood Library and number 9 there is as section of West Norwood Cemetery railing boundary wall. By the double gates is a yellow plastic Lambeth salt bin which is graffiti tagged. item.title: Norwood Road SE27 number 551 (Tesco, 15th June
item.description:
Norwood Road SE27 number 551 (Tesco at Robson Rd junction) pink'ish graffiti tagged on off white concrete wall at the north end of the frontage (ie London Decorator Merchants shop). item.title: Splash pool not in action, 15th June
item.description:
